short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No more clicking on the right arrows and no more small popup!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds two small bits of functionality to the current Pathways experience:

* Each project now opens full-screen on another tab instead of a pop-up.
* Right and left arrows on the keyboard now allow for limited navigation inside the projects.

Each slide activity will still need to be clicked if it requires user interaction, but keyboard slide navigation should make it a bit more intuitive than before.
